moderation.title: Moderation
moderation.description: Learn how content is reviewed and how we handle reports from the community. Ethical moderation helps keep Atelier a place for meaningful interaction and trust.
moderation.demoBlock: Artist applications are reviewed by the moderation team. Judges: sign in with the demo moderator account (demo@email.com / demo) to try approving applications.
moderation.artistApplicationsDesc: Approve or reject requests from users who want to register as artists. Approved users can post artworks and see who liked and commented on their work.

discover.title: Discover Art
discover.description: Artworks validated by your peers and the wider community. Every piece comes with context about why it resonates.
discover.subtitle: Explore artworks validated by your peers and the wider community. Every piece comes with context about why it resonates.
discover.noResultsHint: Try adjusting your filters or search terms

recommendation.sectionTitle: Why We Think You'll Appreciate These
recommendation.sectionDesc: Every recommendation comes with context. We believe you deserve to know why something is suggested, not just what.
recommendation.card1Explanation: Several artists you follow have engaged with similar abstract expressionist styles. These pieces share emotional qualities with works you've appreciated before.
recommendation.card2Explanation: Long-term community members with similar tastes have recently discovered these emerging artists. Their engagement suggests authentic appreciation.
recommendation.card3Explanation: Based on the 'minimalism' keyword in artworks you've liked, here are pieces that explore similar aesthetic principles from diverse perspectives.

artists.title: Artists
artists.sectionDesc: Every artist is verified by human moderators before publishing. Reputation builds through consistent quality and peer recognition.
artists.subtitle: Browse verified artists. Everyone here has been reviewed by moderators. Reputation grows through peer recognition and consistent quality.
artists.noMatchHint: Try different search terms or clear filters to see all verified artists.

principles.sectionDesc: We believe art communities deserve better than engagement-maximizing algorithms. Here's what guides us.
principles.card1Desc: Our AI helps surface patterns and connections, but human judgement remains central. Trust emerges from real relationships.
principles.card2Desc: Every recommendation and trust signal comes with an explanation. No opaque algorithms—you always know why.
principles.card3Desc: We encourage learning and dialogue about art, not financial speculation. Value comes from meaning, not markets.
principles.card4Desc: Our system actively preserves emerging and minority artistic voices, preventing any single group from dominating visibility.

trending.howItWorksIntro: Our trending algorithm prioritizes quality over virality. Instead of simply counting likes, we weight engagement based on:
trending.peerValidationText: Appreciation from verified artists and long-term community members carries more weight.
trending.curatorEndorsementsText: Works featured in peer-curated collections signal trusted quality.
trending.organicGrowthText: Steady, sustained engagement is valued over sudden spikes that may indicate manipulation.

community.title: Built on trust, not likes
community.subtitle: Atelier is a community-driven art platform. Discovery is shaped by your network, peer endorsements, and transparent reputation—not engagement-maximizing algorithms.
community.howInteractDesc: Social validation, peer learning, and community-driven trust are at the heart of Atelier. Here's how you participate.
community.followArtistsDesc: Build your network by following artists you admire. Your feed and recommendations are shaped by who you follow.
community.likeCommentDesc: Engage with artworks and artists. Your likes and comments support creators and help peers discover work.
community.stayLoopDesc: Get notified when someone likes your work, comments, or follows you. Respond and build real connections.
community.peerEndorsementsDesc: Discover through endorsements from verified artists. See why work is recommended—linked to people you trust.
community.communityCurationDesc: Explore collections curated by verified community curators. Themes, moods, and stories—all peer-driven.
community.trustSignalsDesc: See reputation and peer validation on artists and artworks. We surface why something is trusted, not just popularity.
community.trustOverPopDesc: Recommendations come from your network and verified curators, not opaque engagement metrics.
community.peerLearningDesc: Artists endorse each other. Discover work through genuine appreciation and shared practice.
community.explainableSignalsDesc: We show why an artist or artwork is suggested—linked to people you follow and trust.
community.peerVoicesDesc: Artists recommend each other. Here's what the community is saying.
community.joinDesc: Follow artists, explore trusted recommendations, and discover work through people you admire.

footer.tagline: A community-driven art platform built on trust, transparency, and genuine appreciation.
